name: M.O.G.O.L (My Own Game Of Life, minimal version)
name_original: M.O.G.O.L (My Own Game Of Life, minimal version)
description:
Hello, everybody ! I have always been fascinated by John Conway's "Game Of Life" and I thought it was time to build my own version of it. That's why I called it MOGOL (My Own Game Of Life) and I wanted to release it a light version first (downloable open Godot peoject). As it is, the "game" uses a 100x100 grid and has no user interface but here is some help :

KEYS in EDIT mode (light grid)

Spacebar : Switch to PLAY Mode

Left Mouse Button : Revive a Dead Cell

Right Mouse Button : Kill a Living Cell

Enter  :  Step to Next Generation

BackSpace : Clear the World

Ctrl : Create a New Random Starting State

KEYS in PLAY mode (no visible grid)

Spacebar : Pause the Game and Switch to EDIT Mode

THANKS

Thanks to iaknihs for his video tutorial on YouTube.
